text:
[誠意邀請] CHANEL 冬日童話活動
今個節日，親臨京華中心走進 CHANEL 的夢幻世界。 從一系列獨家香水、光彩奪目的彩妝和賦予肌膚非凡感官享受的護膚品中挑選完美的禮物。
日期：2024年10月30日至2025年1月5日
時間：星期日至四 11:00至21:00 | 星期五至六 11:00至21:30
地點：京華中心，香港銅鑼灣渣甸街5-19號地下
立即登記 — [redacted_url]
誠邀您攜同賓客出席。
trans:
[You are cordially invited] CHANEL Winter Fairy Tale Event
This holiday, visit Capitol Centre and step into the dream world of CHANEL. Choose the perfect gifts from a range of exclusive fragrances, radiant cosmetics and extraordinary sensual skincare.
Date: October 30, 2024 to January 5, 2025
Time: Sunday to Thursday 11:00 to 21:00 | Friday to Saturday 11:00 to 21:30
Location: Capitol Centre, G/F, 5-19 Jardine's Bazaar, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
Register now — [redacted_url]
You are cordially invited to attend with your guests.
